document_data.name: Ferry
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ferry''' was the ferry that served [[Thentia]]. It was overseen by ex-Watchlord [[Kaulyx Raemooutha]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Location: The Ferry buildings sat in the far south-eastern corner of Thentia, adjacent to the docks and just under the city's wall.
document_data.Structure: The Ferry consisted of several docks, a comfortable waiting area, an office, and two small warehouses.
document_data.Services: The Ferry operated light wave-runner boats that ran routes between Thentia, [[Melvaunt]], and [[Hillsfar]]. They left Thentia regularly at sunrise, midmorning, midday, midafternoon, and sunset, with only midmorning and midafternoon operating in winter.
